platform-wisun-smart-meter.help: Enable the demo of wisun smart meter

platform-enable-button.help: Enable button usage on the board.

platform-enable-led.help: Enable led usage on the board.

startup_max_random_delay.help: Delay client registration after network formation by random delay in seconds with a maximum defined by the startup_max_delay. Disabled with null or 0.

startup_min_random_delay.help: Delay client registration after network formation by random delay in seconds with a minimum defined by the startup_min_delay. Feature is enabled if STARTUP_MAX_RANDOM_DELAY is defined.

mbedtls-user-config-file.help: Defines which TLS configuration the board should use.

pal-user-defined-configuration.help: Defines which PAL configuration the board should use.
